import React from 'react' import './CheckoutItem.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart, addItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem, clearItem, addItem, decrement}) => { const { imageUrl, name, quantity, price } = cartItem return (
{name}
❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 {price}
clearItem(cartItem) } >✕
) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: (item) => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem: (item) => dispatch(addItem(item)), decrement: (item) => dispatch(decrementQuantity(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
